quotes.label: Wisdom #1
quotes.text: Be on the look out for things that make you laugh. If you see nothing worth laughing at, pretend you see it, then laugh.

quotes.label: Wisdom #2
quotes.text: Add a dab of lavender to milk; leave town with an orange, and pretend you're laughing at it.

quotes.label: Wisdom #3
quotes.text: Whenever you're in a tight spot, try to imagine yourself marooned on a beautiful desert island.

quotes.label: Wisdom #4
quotes.text: When you rest, you are a king surveying your estate. Look at the woodland, the peacocks on the lawn. Be the king of your own calm kingdom.

quotes.label: Wisdom #5
quotes.text: When you're feeling under pressure, do something different. Roll up your sleeves, or eat an orange.

quotes.label: Wisdom #6
quotes.text: Add a drop of lavender to your bath, and soon, you'll soak yourself calm!

quotes.label: Wisdom #7
quotes.text: Let go once in a while. You are a loose lily floating down an amber river.

quotes.label: Wisdom #8
quotes.text: If you want to feel calm, eat more raw fruit and vegetables, yoghurt, milk and seeds.

quotes.label: Wisdom #9
quotes.text: Have you ever seen a calm person with a loud voice? Try and speak softly once in a while.
